item.description:
Tentative Schedule of Events:


12:00- 12:30 Meet & Greet :)

12:30- 1:30 Luncheon

Homemade turkey soup
Fresh turkey for sandwiches
Cold cut sandwiches
Finger sandwiches
Chips
Pickles
Desserts

1:30-2:00 Meet-Up Planning Mtg

2:30-3:30 Wicca Discussion Group
"How do you lead a Magical Life?"

3:30-5:00 Dreamcatcher Protection SpellCraft

There is room for (17) people to make a dreamcatcher protection spellcraft for their house, car or barn-
I will provide all the materials, and teach you how to make your own protection amulet.
(This is now full)

I have made one already to determine the cost of the materials, and they are AWESOME.
The materials are about $10.

Pretty much, you make a dreamcatcher
(which I will teach you how to do, its easy)
and use black, white and red colors, which are protection colors....and you charge a crystal point in the middle for protection, and add
strings of feathers and beads.....
Then hanging below the dreamcatcher is a spell bag with (3) semi-precious protection stones, and about 13 protection herbs... Which we will charge for protection in the car (or you can use it for your house)


You can also come to the meet up and not do the spell craft.....and just continue the pagan discussion or tart up a new one!

We will do the spell craft at the end of the meet
up (around 3:30) as it takes about 1 1/2 - 2hrs
to do it....People who are not doing it can hang around and talk or continue the pagan discussion if they want, or they can leave at that point too :)


Come and meet some great people and check out Pete's Fantasical Creations!
item.how_to_find_us: You won't have any problem, walk in, and everyone will be there! :)
item.why: You will love it because....this group has intelligent, spiritual, knowledgable, funny and happy people that have joined it....We are going to have some good food, some entertaining conversation, and make some awesome spells! Don't miss it! :)
item.name: Protection Spell Craft/ Pot Luck Luncheon/ Discussion
